column2: "Moab dze
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi: Nebo ndue
column5: osiandɛ wɔabɔ no! Woegu Kiriataim n'enyim ase
column6: wɔagye: woegu aban dzendzen no n'enyim ase na wɔadwerew no."

column2: "Nkamfo nnyi hɔ bio mma Moab; woetu no ho egyina bɔn wɔ Hesbon dɛ
column4: ma yentwa no nkyen mma ɔaannyɛ ɔman bio. Madmen
column5: ɔwo so wɔbɛma ayɛ foo; afona betsiw wo."

column2: "Nkekamu ndze fi Horonaim
"Wɔasɛɛ Moab; no nkɔkowaba rekeka mu."
"Na Luhit afowee na wɔdze osu araa bɔfow akɔ sor; na Horonaim esianee na wɔatse ɔsɛɛ ne nkekamu ho mbubuwbɔ."
"Hom nguanguan
column4: na hom nyɛ dɛ sar do asoaso."

column2: "Na osiandɛ ɔwo atwer wo ndwuma na w'akoradze ntsi
column3: wo so wɔbɛfa wo: na Kemos bɔkɔ ndɔmmum

column2: "Na afofanyi no bɛba kurow biara do
column3: na kurow biara rimmfi nsa; bɔnsa so bɛhera
column4: na asaase taae asɛɛ; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE aka no."

column2: "Hom mma Moab nkaadum
column3: na ɔsɛɛ ara na wɔbɛsɛɛ no: no nkurow bɛyɛ amamfo

column2: "Ndom nka nyia ɔyɛ EWURADZE n'edwuma akwadwer mu
column3: na ndom nka nyia osianka n'afona fi bɔgya mu."

column2: "Moab atsena ase ahodwe mu fi ne mbofraber mu
column3: na ɔagyen ataa n'ase dɛ wenyin
column4: na wonnhuee no mmfii adze kor mu nnkɔr adze kor mu
column5: eso ɔnnkɔr ndɔmmum da: dɛm ntsi na ne dɛw aka no mu

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column6: mobɔsoma hɔn a wohue gu ma wɔaaba no do

column2: "Na Moab n'enyi bɔto Kemos ho
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Israel fifo hɔn enyi too hɔn awerɛhyɛmu Bɛtɛl ho no."

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn na hom se dɛ
column3: Yɛyɛ akatakyi na akofo a yebotum ɔko no?"

column2: "Nyia ɔbɔɔ Moab na no nkurow no afow kɔ mu
column3: na ne mberantsɛ a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn no esian kɔ ekumii
column4: ɔhen a ne dzin dze dɔm EWURADZE no na ɔse."

column2: "Moab no mbusu abɛn reba
"Hom a hom abɔ no ho aprɔw nyina
column4: na hom a hom nyim ne dzin nyina; hom nse dɛ

column2: "Ɔwo babaa a etse Dibon
column5: na nyia ɔfa Moab afo no aba wo do

column2: "Hom a hom tse Aroer e
column5: na nyia oefi nsa no; se dɛ

column2: "Woegu Moab n'enyim ase; osiandɛ woedwuruw no egu famu: hom mbɔ mbubuw na hom nkekamu; hom nka wɔ Arnon dɛ
"Na atsɛmbu aba asaase taae no do; ɔaba Holon
"Dibon
"Kiriataim
"Keriot
column4: na Moab asaase do nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ ekyirekyir

column2: "Woetwa Moab n'ambɛn
"Hom mma ɔmbow nsa; osiandɛ okunkoon noho wɔ EWURADZE do: na Moab bɛyankayankam ne fe mu
column3: na ɔno so wɔdze no esi atwetwe."

column2: "Na aso Israel annyɛ atwetwe amma wo? Aso wohun no ewifo mu? Na ɔwo eka no ho asɛm ara apem a
"Ao Moab mba e
column4: na hom ntsena abotan do. Hom nyɛ dɛ ebubur a ɔyɛ no buw wɔ itu no ano no."

column2: "Yɛatse Moab n'ahokyerɛ
column3: dɛ ɔkyerɛ no ho dodow; n'ahomemado

column2: "Minyim n'enyiansɔ
column4: dɛ ne nyinara gyan; n'ahohyehyɛ enntum hwee yɛ."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi nna mobɔ Moab ho mbubuw; nyew
column3: mebɛkeka mu wɔ Moab nyina ho: na Kir-heres mbarimba ntsi wobedzi nkɔmbɔ."

column2: "Ao Sibma wenyindua
column3: medze dza ɔkyɛn Jazer no su na mubosu wo: w'abaw atra po ekodu Jazer po ho mpo: wo hyewber nduadzewa na wo wenyin nduadzewa do na ɔsɛɛfo no ebotu ahyɛ."

column2: "Na woeyi enyigye na dɛw efi mfuwa prɔmprɔm na Moab asaase no do; na mama wenyin asa wɔ wenyinntwer no mu: obiara mmfa esebɔ ntsiatsia do; esebɔ no rennyɛ enyigye esebɔ bi."
"Ofi Hesbon nkekamu no do dze kesi Eleale mpo
column5: ofi Zoar dze kesi Horonaim mpo
column6: dze kesi Eglath-selisiya: na Nimrim esuesu bɛdan asaase kɛsɛɛ."

column2: "Bio so mebɛma nyia ɔbɔ afɔr wɔ no mu sorɔnsorɔmbea
column3: na nyia ɔhyew nduhuam ma n'abosom no abɔ adze wɔ Moab."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi m'akoma gyegye ma Moab dɛ atɛntɛbɛn
column3: na m'akoma gyegye dɛ atɛntɛbɛn ma Kir-heres mbarimba: dɛm ntsi adze pii a woenya no ahera."

column2: "Ne tsir nyina apepa
column3: na n'abɔdwesa nyina ekukuw: nsa nyina ho ayɛ akam akam

column2: "Moab adan nyina etsifi na n'abrɔn do sukwadwom wɔ mbea nyina: na mabɔ Moab dɛ senaba a enyigye nnyi mu
"Mbrɛ woesi edwuruw no a! Mbrɛ wodua bɔ mbubuw a! Mbrɛ Moab edua dze enyito adan n'ekyir a! Dɛm na Moab bɛyɛ atwetwesi na akomatu ama hɔn a wɔabɔ no ho aprɔw nyina."
"Na mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Hwɛ
column4: na ɔatserɛw ne ntsaban mu aba Moab do."

column2: "Keriot wɔagye
column3: na wɔakɔ n'akoban no ntuae. Da no mu
column4: Moab mbarimba akatakyi hɔn akoma bɛyɛ dɛ ɔbaa a ɔroko awoo n'akoma."

column2: "Na wɔbɛsɛɛ Moab ma ɔrennyɛ ɔman bio
column3: osiandɛ oekunkon noho wɔ EWURADZE do."

column2: "Moab mba e
"Nyia obefi suro enyim eguan no ɔbɔkɔtɔ mona no mu; na nyia ɔbɔfow efi mona no mu no
column3: efir no bɛpa no: osiandɛ medze asotwe bɛba ɔno noara Moab no do

column2: "Hɔn a woguanee a wonnyi ahoɔdzen no gyinagyina Hesbon nwinwin ase: na gya fir Hesbon efir edzi
column3: na gyaframee fi Sihon ne finimfin
column5: na weɔɔweɔɔyɛfo no hɔn etsifi pampamu."

column2: "Moab
column3: due! Kemos man abɔ: na wɔafa wo mbabanyin no ndɔmmum
column4: na wɔdze wo mbabaa kɔ ndɔmmumkɔ."

column2: "Naaso medze Moab befi ndɔmmum asan aba wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse. Iyi nye Moab do atsɛmbu."
